post.body: @nixonnow for the LinkedIn Introduction. Thanks Paul!
My favorite is the classic, "Who is buried in Grant's Tomb?"
I can relate to that!
Go read Khoi Vinh's latest post (at the end).
Todd Snider rules, also. He is one of Erin's heroes.
Just in time for the holidays, ABQ Running Shop launches their online store: http://tinyurl.com/48lws2. (Free 2day shipping!)
Just updated my Visited Places CakePHP app to RC3 latest. Went smoothly!
Tucsonans – I'll be speaking at the TDAC WordPress Workshop in January '09: http://twurl.nl/s6ka70. I might rope @sdevore in on it as well.
Just purchased @simplebits Charge Tee http://www.simplebits.com/shop/.
Strongly leaning towards going to WDN in Denver in Feb. 09.
Looking for a few good projects / clients for next spring.
Loving the Easter Egg in WordPress 2.6 and 2.7. Activate it and see for yourself: http://tinyurl.com/5uqkph. "The Matrix has you, Lance..."
Warming up my OmniGraffle skills for some page description diagrams.
Had to pull the "why do you need to call me" line today, à la @shauninman (http://twitter.com/shauninman/status/973545601).
Was at Arizona Stadium tonight... U of A lost a heartbreaker to OSU. Great game, though.
Wow, I hate "leverage" this much, too: http://tinyurl.com/55fhwb.
Woot! Getting caught up finally.
Trying to catch up on feed reading, including 45 clippings in NNW.
Meeting @sdevore for coffee and work today. We are overdue for a code jam session—and we need to catch up on our common projects/clients.
Ahhh... Happy hour at Brooklyn Pizza, FTW!
Polishing up prototypes for today's client meetings.
Tucson Geek Meet tonight, 8pm: http://upcoming.yahoo.com/event/1435945/.
